Brockton.Montello (MBTA station):
Montello is an MBTA Commuter Rail station on the Middleborough/Lakeville Line, located north of downtown Brockton, Massachusetts. It has two full-length high-level platforms serving the line's two tracks and is fully handicapped accessible.


== History ==

The station opened on September 29, 1997 along with the rest of the Old Colony Lines service.
